name: Hurdle Jump ULTRA
description:
Hurdle Jump ULTRA is a prototype that is intended for the Google Cardboard VR platform. (This is the HTML build)

Take a leisurely run through a mountain pass and try and beat your best time. ULTRA!

(The beams will reduce your speed so try to avoid them)

I was thinking about how cool the original NES Track and Field games were when I thought of doing this.

I hope you enjoy it.

KEYS:

HOLD ALT and Move Mouse - To look around

SPACEBAR - Jump
